Package ch.zh.transferclient.main

Provides classes for starting and stopping the application.
Version:
2.4
Author:
Daniel Bierer (Statistisches Amt des Kantons ZÃ¼rich)
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Archiving_Old_Receipts
    This class is used to delete old receipts.
    Conf
    This class is used to specify parameters which are not accessible by the external configuration file.
    CreateSubFolders
    The class is used to create the needed subfolders if they do not exist.
    Exit
    This class is used to exit the application.
    Labels
    This class provides the labels depending on the selected language.
    Logger
    This class is used for logging messages.
    Main
    This class is used for starting the application.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Logger.LogLevel
    Available log levels.
